title: Unsync Phone Contacts when adding multiple Google Accounts on the phone
content:
My pixel 2 phone added all contacts from my 3 gmail accounts I linked to the phone, over 2500 contacts. I only want to have the 851 contacts from my old iphone, not see contacts that I emailed once and never called. 

My goal: To have 3 gmail accounts on my pixel 2 phone, but only have the 851 contacts from my old iphone shown on the phone app
